description: in a landscape with a large sun in the upper left corner sits a bald man in a chair wearing a black suit with his hands folded on his lap; colored in yellow, blue, red, and green
inscription: LLC in plate: W.G. 19 | LLC of sheet, in pencil: Handdruck handkoloriert. / E 21 C | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2373
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 19. | LL in pencil, below image: Bogislav
title: Bogislav (Walter Pritzkow)
